meanings.definition: The practice or skill of an ombudsman.
meanings.sent1: Understanding ombudsmanships requires learning about how ombudsmen help people.
meanings.sent2: She studied ombudsmanships to become a better ombudsman herself.
meanings.sent3: The ombudsmanships of the office were put to the test when resolving conflicts.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to ombudsmanships shone through in every case he handled.
meanings.sent5: The workshop on ombudsmanships left a lasting impression on the attendees.

meanings.definition: The responsibilities or duties of an ombudsman.
meanings.sent1: The ombudsmanships of investigating complaints require attention to detail.
meanings.sent2: She took on the ombudsmanships of ensuring fair treatment for all.
meanings.sent3: The ombudsmanships of mediating disputes can sometimes be challenging.
meanings.sent4: In his role, he carried out the ombudsmanships with integrity and fairness.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the ombudsmanships is crucial for effective conflict resolution.
